message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the initial offer I made. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a good return on my investment.

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $11000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're trying to negotiate a good price, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to think about the product's value to me and the market demand. I'm willing to consider $12500. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to further discussion if you're willing to meet me at this price.

I'm afraid $12500 is still too high for me. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I can only go up to $10500. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
